title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Updated Docker base image to a newer version.
Minor documentation fixes: removed extra line in SSH guide, added line in CodeQL CLI intro.
Enhanced CodeQL CLI documentation: added section on extractor options and clarified commands.
Restructured global security advisories content for clarity and scannability.
Deprecated Copilot code review static analysis tools (CodeQL, ESLint, PMD) and removed related content.
Added pull request lifecycle metrics (merge count, cycle time) for Copilot coding agent.
Clarified Copilot CLI plugin installation from Git repositories and updated plugin reference.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
